src: Ford accepts the fait accompli with good grace.
mt: Fordi e pranon faktin e kryer me mirësi.
backtranslation: Because he accepts the accomplished fact with kindness.

src: Falstaff, pleased to find himself not the only dupe, proclaims that all the world is folly, and all are figures of fun ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "Everything in the world is a jest... but he laughs well who laughs the final laugh").
mt: Falstafi, i kënaqur që nuk është i vetmi mashtruar, shpall se e gjithë bota është marrëzi dhe të gjithë janë figura qesharake ("Tutto nel mondo è burla... Tutti gabbati!... Ma ride ben chi ride La risata final." / "Gjithçka në botë është shaka... por ai qesh mirë që qesh i fundit").
backtranslation: Falstaff, pleased that he is not the only one deceived, declares that the whole world is folly and everyone is a ridiculous figure ("Everything in the world is a joke... Everyone is deceived!... But he laughs well who laughs the final laugh." / "Everything in the world is a joke... but he laughs well who laughs last").

src: The entire company repeats his proclamation in an exuberant ten-voice fugue.
mt: E gjithë kompania përsërit shpalljen e tij në një fugë të gjallë dhjetë zërash.
backtranslation: The entire company repeats his announcement in a lively ten-voice fugue.

src: They won all their group matches to finish top of the pool.
mt: Ata fituan të gjitha ndeshjet e grupit të tyre për të përfunduar në krye të grupit.
backtranslation: They won all their group matches to finish at the top of the group.

src: After defeating France in the quarter-finals, they lost to the eventual tournament winners South Africa in the semi-finals.
mt: Pasi mundën Francën në çerekfinale, ata humbën nga fituesit e turneut, Afrika e Jugut, në gjysmëfinale.
backtranslation: After defeating France in the quarterfinals, they lost to the tournament winners, South Africa, in the semifinals.

src: The arrangement of Thiele and Ladiges was not accepted by George, and was discarded in his 1999 revision.
mt: Renditja e Thiele dhe Ladiges nuk u pranua nga George dhe u hodh poshtë në rishikimin e tij të vitit 1999.
backtranslation: The classification by Thiele and Ladiges was not accepted by George and was rejected in his 1999 review.

src: Under George's 1999 arrangement, B. epica's placement was as follows:
mt: Sipas marrëveshjes së George-it të vitit 1999, vendosja e B. epica ishte si më poshtë:
backtranslation: According to George's 1999 agreement, the placement of B. epica was as follows:.

src: The Outsider also grants his mark, and special abilities, to other characters.
mt: I Jashtëm gjithashtu u jep shenjën e tij dhe aftësi të veçanta karaktereve të tjerë.
backtranslation: The External also gives his mark and special abilities to other characters.

src: Smith described the character as an amoral figure who grants abilities, but leaves the choice of how to use them up to the recipient.
mt: Smiti e përshkroi personazhin si një figurë amorale që jep aftësi, por lë zgjedhjen e mënyrës se si t'i përdorë ato në dorën e marrësit.
backtranslation: Smiti described the character as an amoral figure who provides abilities but leaves the choice of how to use them in the hands of the recipient.

src: Devil May Cry begins with Dante (Drew Coombs) being attacked in his office by a mysterious woman named Trish (Sara Lafleur).
mt: Devil May Cry fillon me sulmin që i bëhet Dantes (Drew Coombs) në zyrën e tij nga një grua misterioze me emrin Trish (Sara Lafleur).
backtranslation: Devil May Cry begins with the attack on Dante (Drew Coombs) in his office by a mysterious woman named Trish (Sara Lafleur).

src: He impresses her by easily brushing off her assault, and explains that for years, he has hunted demons in pursuit of the ones who killed his mother and brother.
mt: Ai e impresionon duke e zmbrapsur lehtë sulmin e saj dhe shpjegon se prej vitesh ka gjuajtur demonë në ndjekje të atyre që vranë nënën dhe vëllain e tij.
backtranslation: He impresses her by easily repelling her attack and explains that for years he has been hunting demons in pursuit of those who killed his mother and brother.

src: Trish explains that her attack was a test, and that the demon emperor Mundus (Tony Daniels), whom Dante holds responsible for the deaths of his family, is planning to cross over into the human world after centuries of imprisonment.
mt: Trish shpjegon se sulmi i saj ishte një provë dhe se perandori demon Mundus (Tony Daniels), të cilin Dante e mban përgjegjës për vdekjen e familjes së tij, po planifikon të kalojë në botën e njerëzve pas shekujsh burgim.
backtranslation: Trish explains that her attack was a test and that the demon emperor Mundus (Tony Daniels), whom Dante holds responsible for the death of his family, is planning to cross into the human world after centuries of imprisonment.

src: Rainbow is a documentary filmmaker.
mt: Rainbow është një regjizor dokumentarësh.
backtranslation: Rainbow is a documentary director.

src: Liz O'Rourke says she is now working with the mentally disabled (although she is later revealed to be a midwife in the episode "Father Figure").
mt: Liz O'Rourke thotë se tani punon me të paaftët mendërisht (megjithëse më vonë zbulohet se është një mamive në episodin "Figura e Atit").
backtranslation: Liz O'Rourke says she now works with the mentally disabled (although it is later revealed that she is a midwife in the episode "Father Figure").

src: Trish Skye says she had problems but has been clean and sober for two years; she works at a funeral home and is a freelance writer.
mt: Trish Skye thotë se ka pasur probleme, por ka dy vjet që është e pastër dhe e përmbajtur; ajo punon në një shtëpi funerale dhe është shkrimtare e pavarur.
backtranslation: Trish Skye says she has had problems, but she has been clean and sober for two years; she works at a funeral home and is a freelance writer.

src: Before joining Bernard in Paris, Rosa stays in a flat in London for several weeks.
mt: Para se t'i bashkohet Bernardit në Paris, Rosa qëndron në një apartament në Londër për disa javë.
backtranslation: To join Bernard in Paris, Rosa stays in an apartment in London for a few weeks.

src: Now that she has no intention of honouring the agreement of her passport, which was to return to South Africa within a year, she openly introduces herself as Burger's daughter.
mt: Tani që ajo nuk ka ndërmend të respektojë marrëveshjen e pasaportës së saj, e cila ishte të kthehej në Afrikën e Jugut brenda një viti, ajo prezantohet hapur si vajza e Burgerit.
backtranslation: Now that she does not intend to comply with her passport agreement, which was to return to South Africa within a year, she openly presents herself as Burger's daughter.

src: This attracts the attention of the media and she attends several political events.
mt: Kjo tërheq vëmendjen e mediave dhe ajo merr pjesë në disa ngjarje politike.
backtranslation: This attracts media attention and she participates in several political events.

src: Following Roy Hodgson's appointment, The Sun mocked his rhotacism manner of speech with a "Bwing on the Euwos!" front-page headline.
mt: Pas emërimit të Roy Hodgsonit, gazeta The Sun e talli mënyrën e tij të të folurit me rrotacizëm me një titull në faqen e parë "Bwing on the Euwos!".
backtranslation: After the appointment of Roy Hodgson, The Sun newspaper mocked his rhotacism speech with a front-page headline "Bwing on the Euwos!".

src: The FA called the headline "unacceptable" and more than 100 people complained to the Press Complaints Commission.
mt: FA e quajti titullin "të papranueshëm" dhe më shumë se 100 persona u ankuan në Komisionin e Ankesave të Shtypit.
backtranslation: FA called the title "unacceptable" and more than 100 people complained to the Press Complaints Commission.

src: As a response to this, in 2017 boats off the British Columbia coast now have a minimum approach distance of 200 metres compared to the previous 100 metres.
mt: Si përgjigje ndaj kësaj, në vitin 2017, varkat në brigjet e Kolumbisë Britanike kanë tani një distancë minimale afrimi prej 200 metrash, krahasuar me 100 metra të mëparshme.
backtranslation: In response to this, in 2017, boats on the shores of British Columbia now have a minimum approach distance of 200 meters, compared to the previous 100 meters.

src: This new rule complements Washington State's minimum approach zone of 180 metres that has been in effect since 2011.
mt: Ky rregull i ri plotëson zonën minimale të qasjes prej 180 metrash të Shtetit të Uashingtonit, e cila ka qenë në fuqi që nga viti 2011.
backtranslation: This new rule fulfills the minimum access area of 180 meters of the State of Washington, which has been in effect since 2011.

src: If a whale approaches a vessel it must be placed in neutral until the whale passes.
mt: Nëse një balenë i afrohet një anijeje, ajo duhet të vendoset në neutral derisa balena të kalojë.
backtranslation: If a whale approaches a ship, it should be put in neutral until the whale passes.

src: A number of locations in and around Dallas were used in production.
mt: Një numër vendesh në Dallas dhe rrethinat e tij u përdorën për prodhim.
backtranslation: A number of locations in Dallas and its surroundings were used for production.

src: An office in Renaissance Tower was used for the OCP interior of; the company's exterior is Dallas City Hall, modified with matte paintings to appear taller.
mt: Një zyrë në Kullën e Rilindjes u përdor për brendësinë e OCP-së; pamja e jashtme e kompanisë është Bashkia e Dallasit, e modifikuar me piktura mat për të dukur më të lartë.
backtranslation: An office in the Renaissance Tower was used for the interior of OCP; the exterior view of the company is Dallas City Hall, modified with matte paintings to appear taller.

src: The OCP elevator was that of the Plaza of the Americas.
mt: Ashensori OCP ishte ai i Plaza of the Americas.
backtranslation: The OCP elevator was the one at Plaza of the Americas.

src: Although the traditional accounts are in agreement that Lydda almost immediately fell into obscurity following the founding of Ramla, narratives vary about the extent of Sulayman's efforts to transfer Lydda's inhabitants to Ramla, some holding that he only demolished a church in Lydda and others that he demolished the city altogether.
mt: Megjithëse burimet tradicionale janë dakord se Lida ra pothuajse menjëherë në harresë pas themelimit të Ramlës, rrëfimet ndryshojnë në lidhje me masën e përpjekjeve të Sulejmanit për të transferuar banorët e Lidas në Ramla, disa duke pretenduar se ai vetëm shkatërroi një kishë në Lida dhe të tjerë se ai e shkatërroi qytetin tërësisht.
backtranslation: Although traditional sources agree that Lida almost immediately fell into oblivion after the founding of Ramla, accounts differ regarding the extent of Suleiman's efforts to transfer the inhabitants of Lida to Ramla, with some claiming that he only destroyed a church in Lida and others that he completely destroyed the city.

src: Al-Ya'qubi (d. 839) noted Sulayman razed the houses of Lydda's inhabitants to force their relocation to Ramla and punished those who resisted.
mt: Al-Ja'kubi (v. 839) vuri në dukje se Sulejmani prishi shtëpitë e banorëve të Lidasit për t'i detyruar të zhvendoseshin në Ramla dhe dënoi ata që i kundërshtuan.
backtranslation: Al-Ja'kubi (in 839) noted that Suleiman demolished the houses of the inhabitants of Lydda to force them to move to Ramla and punished those who opposed him.

src: In the words of al-Jahshiyari, Sulayman "founded the town of al-Ramla and its mosque and thus caused the ruin of Lod
mt: Sipas fjalëve të al-Jahshiyari, Sulajmani "themeloi qytetin e al-Ramla dhe xhaminë e tij dhe kështu shkaktoi shkatërrimin e Lodit"
backtranslation: According to the words of al-Jahshiyari, Sulayman "founded the city of al-Ramla and its mosque and thus caused the destruction of Lydda."

src: Rolling Stone includes the album and several songs on various "best of" lists, such as:
mt: Rolling Stone përfshin albumin dhe disa këngë në lista të ndryshme "më të mirat", siç janë:
backtranslation: Rolling Stone includes the album and several songs in various "best" lists, such as:.

src: The Tactical Patrol Force (TPF) of the New York City Police Department arrived to free the police trapped inside the Stonewall.
mt: Forca Taktike e Patrullës (TPF) e Departamentit të Policisë së Qytetit të Nju Jorkut mbërriti për të liruar policët e bllokuar brenda Stonewallit.
backtranslation: The Tactical Patrol Force (TPF) of the New York City Police Department arrived to free the officers trapped inside the Stonewall.

src: One officer's eye was cut and a few others were bruised from being struck by flying debris.
mt: Një zyrtar u plagos në sy dhe disa të tjerë u lënduan nga goditjet e mbeturinave që fluturuan.
backtranslation: An official was injured in the eye and several others were hurt by flying debris.

src: Bob Kohler, who was walking his dog by the Stonewall that night, saw the TPF arrive:
mt: Bob Kohleri, i cili po shëtisnin qenin e tij pranë Stonewall-it atë natë, pa TPF-në të mbërrinte:
backtranslation: Bob Kohler, who was walking his dog near Stonewall that night, saw the TPF arrive.

src: Waziri and Afonja save Tawa.
mt: Uaziri dhe Afonja shpëtojnë Tavën.
backtranslation: Waziri and Afonja save Tava.

src: Waziri subsequently presents his account of the investigation to the British, who instruct him to withhold Aderopo's identity; he reluctantly agrees to do so for the sake of a peaceful independence.
mt: Më pas, Waziri paraqet llogarinë e tij të hetimit te britanikët, të cilët e udhëzojnë të fshehë identitetin e Aderopos; ai pranon me hezitim ta bëjë këtë për hir të një pavarësie paqësore.
backtranslation: Then, Waziri presents his investigation report to the British, who instruct him to conceal Aderopo's identity; he reluctantly agrees to do so for the sake of a peaceful independence.

src: Diller planned on a new Star Trek series forming the cornerstone for a new television network.
mt: Diller planifikoi që një seri e re e Star Trek të ishte gurthemeli i një rrjeti të ri televiziv.
backtranslation: Diller planned for a new Star Trek series to be the cornerstone of a new television network.

src: Though Paramount was reluctant to abandon its work on the film, Roddenberry wanted to bring many of the production staff from the original series to work on the new show, titled Star Trek: Phase II.
mt: Megjithëse Paramount ishte hezituar të braktise punën e tij në film, Rodenberi donte të sillte shumë nga stafi i prodhimit të serialit origjinal për të punuar në shfaqjen e re, të titulluar Star Trek: Faza II.
backtranslation: Although Paramount was hesitant to abandon his work on the film, Roddenberry wanted to bring much of the original series' production staff to work on the new show, titled Star Trek: Phase II.

src: Chilean devil ray (M. tarapacana)
mt: Rreze djalli kilian (M. tarapacana)
backtranslation: Devil's ray kilian (M. tarapacana).

src: Cory Edwards chose to approach the film predominantly as an action/comedy, instead of as a typical animated film, and wrote the script to appeal to audiences of any age like many of the films produced by Pixar or Disney.
mt: Korija Edwardsi zgjodhi ta afronte filmin kryesisht si një film aksion/komedi, në vend të një filmi të animuar tipik, dhe shkroi skenarin për t'u tërhequr audiencën e çdo moshe, si shumë prej filmave të prodhuar nga Pixar ose Disney.
backtranslation: Edward's choice was to approach the film primarily as an action/comedy film, rather than a typical animated film, and he wrote the script to appeal to audiences of all ages, much like many of the films produced by Pixar or Disney.

src: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons and The Incredibles (2004) have all been cited as inspirations for the film.
mt: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons dhe The Incredibles (2004) janë përmendur si frymëzime për filmin.
backtranslation: Bugs Bunny, Road Runner, The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends, The Muppets, The Simpsons, and The Incredibles (2004) are mentioned as inspirations for the film.

src: By the early 1930s, Orizaba's typical route had remained virtually the same, though Nassau and Tampico were dropped as ports of call.
mt: Nga fillimi i viteve 1930, rruga tipike e Orizabës kishte mbetur praktikisht e njëjtë, megjithëse Nassau dhe Tampico u hoqën si porte të thirrjes.
backtranslation: Since the early 1930s, the typical route of Orizaba had remained practically the same, although Nassau and Tampico were removed as ports of call.

src: It was in this period that American poet Hart Crane leapt to his death from Orizaba.
mt: Në këtë periudhë poeti amerikan Hart Crane u hodh nga Orizaba dhe vdiq.
backtranslation: During this period, the American poet Hart Crane jumped from the Orizaba and died.

src: At around noon on 27 April 1932, while the ship was headed to New York—some 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) off the Florida coast—Crane, clad in pajamas and overcoat, climbed the rail at the stern of the ship and plunged into the ocean.
mt: Rreth mesditës së 27 prillit 1932, ndërsa anija ishte nisur drejt Nju Jorkut—rreth 275 milje (443 km) në veri të Havanës dhe 10 milje (16 km) nga bregu i Floridës—Kreni, i veshur me pizhamë dhe pallto, u ngjit në parmakun e pasme të anijes dhe u hodh në oqean.
backtranslation: Around midday on April 27, 1932, while the ship was headed towards New York—about 275 miles (443 km) north of Havana and 10 miles (16 km) off the coast of Florida—Kreni, dressed in pajamas and a coat, climbed onto the ship's railing and jumped into the ocean.

src: How you use your eyes, your position, and how you maximize camera angles... I didn't know those things before."
mt: Si i përdorni sytë, pozicionin tuaj dhe si i maksimizoni këndet e kamerës... Nuk i dija këto gjëra më parë.
backtranslation: If you use your eyes, your position, and how you maximize the camera angles... I didn't know these things before.

src: To prepare for the role of a courtesan, she learned different styles of ballroom dances and trained in pole dance for three months.
mt: Për t'u përgatitur për rolin e një kurtezane, ajo mësoi stile të ndryshme të valleve të sallës dhe u stërvit në vallëzim me shtyllë për tre muaj.
backtranslation: To prepare for the role of a courtesan, she learned different ballroom dance styles and trained in pole dancing for three months.

src: Critic Julia
mt: Kritik Julia
backtranslation: Criticize Julia.

src: On August 26, George H. W. Bush toured devastated areas of Louisiana with Governor Edwin Edwards.
mt: Më 26 gusht, George H. W. Bush vizitoi zonat e shkatërruara të Luizianës me guvernatorin Edwin Edwards.
backtranslation: On August 26, George H. W. Bush visited the devastated areas of Louisiana with Governor Edwin Edwards.

src: President Bush remarked, "The destruction from this storm goes beyond anything we have known in recent years," but noted that damage was less severe than in Florida.
mt: Presidenti Bush vuri në dukje se "Shkatërrimi i shkaktuar nga kjo stuhi tejkalon çdo gjë që kemi njohur në vitet e fundit", por theksoi se dëmet ishin më pak të rënda se në Florida.
backtranslation: President Bush noted that "The destruction caused by this storm surpasses anything we have known in recent years," but emphasized that the damages were less severe than in Florida.

src: After his visit to Louisiana, President Bush declared only Terrebonne Parish as a disaster area, but later included 34 other parishes under this declaration.
mt: Pas vizitës së tij në Luizianë, Presidenti Bush shpalli vetëm Parishin Terrebonne si zonë katastrofe, por më vonë përfshiu 34 paritete të tjera nën këtë deklaratë.
backtranslation: After his visit to Louisiana, President Bush declared only Terrebonne Parish as a disaster area, but later included 34 other parishes under this declaration.

src: When general elections were held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC polled 20.8 percent of the popular vote and secured 26 out of a total of 120 parliamentary seats.
mt: Kur u mbajtën zgjedhjet e përgjithshme në korrik 2003, CPP fitoi, ndërsa FUNCINPEC mori 20.8 për qind të votave popullore dhe siguroi 26 nga 120 vendet parlamentare.
backtranslation: When the general elections were held in July 2003, the CPP won, while FUNCINPEC received 20.8 percent of the popular vote and secured 26 out of 120 parliamentary seats.

src: This marked an 11 percentage point drop in FUNCINPEC's share of the popular vote compared with 1998.
mt: Kjo shënoi një rënie prej 11 pikësh përqindjeje në pjesën e votave popullore të FUNCINPEC-ut krahasuar me vitin 1998.
backtranslation: This marked an 11 percentage point drop in FUNCINPEC's share of the popular vote compared to 1998.

src: Palaces are usually arranged around one or more courtyards, with their façades facing inwards; some examples are adorned with sculpture.
mt: Pallatet zakonisht rregullohen rreth një ose më shumë oborre, me fasadat e tyre të drejtuara nga brenda; disa shembuj janë zbukuruar me skulpturë.
backtranslation: Palaces are usually arranged around one or more courtyards, with their facades facing inward; some examples are adorned with sculpture.

src: Some palaces possess associated hieroglyphic descriptions that identify them as the royal residences of named rulers.
mt: Disa pallate kanë përshkrime hieroglifike që i identifikojnë ato si rezidenca mbretërore të sundimtarëve të emëruar.
backtranslation: Some palaces have hieroglyphic descriptions that identify them as royal residences of appointed rulers.

src: The Inquisition post mortem held after Minsterworth's execution casts light upon his land-holding, much of which was held directly off John of Gaunt, son of King Edward III.
mt: Hetimi pas vdekjes i mbajtur pas ekzekutimit të Minsterworthit hedh dritë mbi zotërimet e tij të tokave, shumica e të cilave mbaheshin drejtpërdrejt nga John i Gauntit, djali i Mbretit Edward III.
backtranslation: The post-mortem inquest held after the execution at Minsterworth sheds light on his land holdings, most of which were held directly by John of Gaunt, the son of King Edward III.

src: This was particularly concentrated in the southwest of England.
mt: Kjo ishte veçanërisht e përqendruar në jugperëndim të Anglisë.
backtranslation: This was particularly concentrated in the southwest of England.

src: Daniel feels ignored by his father, who has chosen Alexis to be his best man.
mt: Danieli ndihet i injoruar nga babai i tij, i cili e ka zgjedhur Aleksin të jetë dëshmitari i tij.
backtranslation: Daniel feels ignored by his father, who has chosen Alex to be his witness.

src: Christina McKinney (Ashley Jensen), MODE's seamstress, reunites with her husband Stuart (Derek Riddell) after leaving him in Scotland years ago; he reveals he is dying of a rare disease which requires a $100,000 operation.
mt: Kristina Makini (Ešli Xhensen), qepëse e MODE-s, ribashkohet me bashkëshortin e saj, Stjuartin (Derek Ridell), pasi e kishte lënë në Skoci vite më parë; ai zbulon se po vdes nga një sëmundje e rrallë, e cila kërkon një operacion prej 100.000 dollarësh.
backtranslation: Kristina Makini (Ashley Jensen), a fashion seamstress, reunites with her husband, Stuart (Derek Riddell), after leaving him in Scotland years earlier; he reveals that he is dying from a rare disease, which requires a $100,000 surgery.

src: Mistress Quickly rushes in, shouting that Ford has returned home unexpectedly with a retinue of henchmen to catch his wife's lover.
mt: Zonja Kuikëli hyn me nxitim, duke bërtitur se Fordi është kthyer papritur në shtëpi me një grup njerëzish për të kapur dashnorin e gruas së tij.
backtranslation: Mrs. Kuikëli rushes in, shouting that Ford has suddenly returned home with a group of people to catch his wife's lover.

src: Falstaff hides first behind the screen, but realizes that Ford will likely look for him there.
mt: Falstafi fshihet fillimisht pas paravanit, por e kupton se Fordi ka të ngjarë ta kërkojë atje.
backtranslation: Falstaff initially hides behind the screen, but realizes that Ford is likely to look for him there.

src: The women urge him to hide in the laundry basket, which he does.
mt: Gratë e nxisin të fshihet në koshin e rrobave, gjë që ai e bën.
backtranslation: The women urge him to hide in the laundry basket, which he does.

src: In that year he was seen by Arthur Sullivan and, separately, by W. S. Gilbert, in performances of their one-act comic opera Trial by Jury.
mt: Atë vit ai u pa nga Arthur Sullivan dhe, veçmas, nga W. S. Gilbert, në shfaqjet e operës së tyre komike me një akt, "Gjyqi nga juria".
backtranslation: That year he was seen by Arthur Sullivan and, separately, by W. S. Gilbert, in the performances of their one-act comic opera, "Trial by Jury."

src: Impressed, they engaged him to play the comic lead in their new, full-length work, The Sorcerer.
mt: Të impresionuar, ata e angazhuan atë për të luajtur rolin kryesor komik në veprën e tyre të re, "Magjistari".
backtranslation: Impressed, they hired him to play the leading comedic role in their new play, "The Magician."

src: Thereafter, Grossmith created the leading comic role in each of Gilbert and Sullivan's long-running comic operas until The Yeomen of the Guard, which closed in 1889.
mt: Më pas, Grossmith krijoi rolin kryesor komik në secilën nga operat komike të Gilbert dhe Sullivan deri në "The Yeomen of the Guard", e cila u mbyll në vitin 1889.
backtranslation: Later, Grossmith created the leading comic role in each of Gilbert and Sullivan's comic operas up to "The Yeomen of the Guard," which closed in 1889.

src: While returning home, Sudeep kidnaps and strangles Nani to death, making his death look like an accident.
mt: Ndërsa kthehej në shtëpi, Sudeep rrëmben dhe e vret Nanin me grusht, duke e bërë vdekjen e tij të duket si aksident.
backtranslation: As he was returning home, Sudeep kidnaps and kills Nani with a punch, making his death look like an accident.

src: Before dying, Nani curses Sudeep, swearing to kill Sudeep if he tries to hurt Bindu.
mt: Para se të vdesë, Nani e mallkon Sudeepin, duke u betuar se do ta vrasë nëse ai përpiqet të lëndojë Bindun.
backtranslation: Before she dies, Nani curses Sudeep, vowing to kill him if he tries to harm Bindu.

src: Unaware of the incident, Bindu confesses her love for the dying Nani by phone; it is the last thing Nani hears before he dies.
mt: Pa e ditur për incidentin, Bindu i rrëfen dashurinë e saj Naniut që po vdes nëpërmjet telefonit; kjo është gjëja e fundit që Naniu dëgjon para se të vdesë.
backtranslation: Unaware of the incident, Bindu confesses her love to Naniu, who is dying, over the phone; this is the last thing Naniu hears before he dies.

src: When Amir does not return, Tati and her aunt are worried: as Tati saw Amir with Omi, she fears that the two have run away together.
mt: Kur Amiri nuk kthehet, Tati dhe tezja e saj shqetësohen: pasi Tati e pa Amirn me Omin, ajo ka frikë se të dy janë arratisur bashkë.
backtranslation: When Amir doesn't return, Tati and her aunt become worried: after Tati saw Amir with Omi, she fears that the two have run away together.

src: Heartbroken, she intends to return to Cigading.
mt: E pikëlluar, ajo synon të kthehet në Cigading.
backtranslation: Saddened, she intends to return to Cigading.

src: The rare formal social events in the Pooters' lives are particular magnets for misfortune.
mt: Ngjarjet e rralla sociale formale në jetën e familjes Pooter janë magnetë të veçantë për fatkeqësi.
backtranslation: The rare formal social events in the Pooter family's life are special magnets for misfortune.

src: They receive an invitation from the Lord Mayor of London to attend a ball at the Mansion House for "Representatives of Trade and Commerce".
mt: Ata marrin një ftesë nga Kryetari i Bashkisë së Londrës për të marrë pjesë në një ballë në Mansion House për "Përfaqësuesit e Tregtisë dhe Biznesit".
backtranslation: They receive an invitation from the Mayor of London to attend a ball at Mansion House for the "Representatives of Trade and Business."

src: †Mammuthus primigenius (woolly mammoth)
mt: †Mammuthus primigenius (mamuti leshtor)
backtranslation: †Mammuthus primigenius (woolly mammoth).
